mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select r.reseridx,r.berthidx,r.userid,r.resername, r.reservisitstart,r.reservisitend,r.reserpriceinfo, r.reserprice,r.reserpriceday,r.resertel,r.reserstate, r.reserreview,r.reserper,b.infoimg,b.infoname,c.berthname from reser r,berthinfo b,berth c where r.berthidx = b.idx and r.berthidx = c.berthidx and r.userid = #{userId} order by reservisitstart) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}

select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select r.reseridx,r.berthidx,r.userid,r.resername, r.reservisitstart,r.reservisitend,r.reserpriceinfo, r.reserprice,r.reserpriceday,r.resertel,r.reserstate, r.reserreview,r.reserper,b.infoimg,b.infoname,c.berthname from reser r,berthinfo b,berth c where r.berthidx = b.idx and r.berthidx = c.berthidx and r.userid = #{userId} and r.reserReview = 'N' order by reservisitstart) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}

select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select r.reviewidx,r.berthidx,r.userid,r.reviewContent,r.reviewdate,r.reviewscore,i.img from review r,img i where r.reviewidx = i.idx and r.userid = #{userId} order by r.reviewidx) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from liketable where userid = #{userId} order by idx) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
